name: animeseason - dark(er)
description: I just remodeled the website a bit. Not the best way to do it, but I'm satisfied with the results.
css: @-moz-document domain("www.animeseason.com"){ body { background:url(http://i1186.photobucket.com/albums/z369/antagonisticvoid/232323272727282828_185.png) !important; } #container { border-left:1px solid rgba(255,255,255, 0.1); border-right:1px solid rgba(255,255,255, 0.1); background-color:rgba(0,0,0, 0.1) !important; } #header { background:none; height: 0 !important; padding:0 !important; } #header_left  { height: 0    !important; } #header_right { display:none !important; } #home_link { position:fixed; top: -5px; left: 5px; height: 30px !important; width:  30px !important; box-shadow:0 0 5px rgba(255,255,255, 0.3); } #feature_menu_wrapper { display:none !important; } #content_wrapper { background:none !important; } #content_top { background:none !important; } .content_bloc { background:rgba(0,0,0,0.1) !important; border:none !important; box-shadow:0 0 3px rgba(255,255,255,0.1); } #main { margin:10px; background:none !important; } #header_sponsors { background:none !important; } #header_ongoing { background:none !important; } #header_animelist { background:none !important; } .header_bloc { background:rgba(0,0,0,0.1) !important; box-shadow:0 0 3px rgba(255,255,255,0.1); } .frontpage_header { background:rgba(0,0,0,0.2) !important; } #left_top { background:none !important; } #left_menu { background:none !important; } #right_top { background:none !important; } #right_menu { background:none !important; } .series a { border-bottom:1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.05) !important; border-top:1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.01) !important; background:none !important; } .series_block { background:none !important; } .series_block a img { box-shadow:0 0 2px rgba(255,255,255,1); padding:0; margin-right:6px; } .tag_padding{ background:rgba(0,0,0,0.1) !important; border:none !important; box-shadow:0 0 2px rgba(255,255,255,0.1); } #veoh_tab, #myspace_tab, #source2_tab, #flash_tab, #other_tab, #ratings_tab, #recommendations_tab { background:rgba(0,0,0,0.1) !important; border-left:1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.1); border-top:1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.1); border-right:1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.1); } #video_update_bar { background-color:transparent !important; } #nav_prev a, #nav_next a { background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0.1) !important; box-shadow:0 0 2px rgba(255,255,255,0.3); } #nav_prev a { border-left:5px solid #222; } #nav_prev a:hover { border-left:5px solid #7CCEFF; } #nav_next a { border-right:5px solid #222; } #nav_next a:hover { border-right:5px solid #7CCEFF; } .med_rectangle { display:none !important; } .must_watch_count, .must_watch_pair, .must_watch_video { background-color:transparent !important; } #must_watch_listing { border:none !important; width:100% !important; } .must_watch_video { border-top:1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.1) !important;} #btn_report, #must_watch, #video_views, #get_flash, #last_watched { display:none !important; } #categories_container { background:none !important; } .btn_submit { background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0.1) !important; box-shadow:0 0 2px rgba(255,255,255,0.3); } .even { background-color:rgba(56,56,56,0.3) !important; } #avg_rating, #rating_set { background-color:rgba(56,56,56,0.3) !important; } .series_alpha { background-color:transparent !important; } #footer { background-image:none !important; } }
